URhulumente ongumvuka wentsebenziswano ekhokelela ekwandisweni kokunikezelwa kweenkonzo waphakanyiswa kweli khulu lokuqala leentsuku:
* Ngokwamaphulo enkqubo iConsolidated Municipal Infrastructure Programme (iCMIP)
* Ngokuvulwa kwamaphulo okwakhiwa kwezindlu
* Ngokudalwa kwakamaqela okulwa neentlekele
* Ngokuphakanyiswa kolawulo lukarhlumente oluhlanganyelweyo



I-CONSOLIDATED MUNICIPAL INFRASTRUCTURE PROGRAMME (iCMIP)


I-Consolidated Municipal Infrastructure Programme yasekwa kweli lizwe lonke ukuxhasa oomaspala ukuze banikezele ngezibonelelo ezintsha ze babuyisele kwisimo esisiso futhi baphuculwe izibonelelo esele zikho, ingakumbi kwiindawo ezihlelelekileyo.

Oomaspala ngabona baboneleli beenkonzo kubemi. Oku ke kuquka ukufumana amanzi, ucoceko, ulawulo lwenkukuma eluqilima, umbane ofikelelekayo nokhuselekileyo, izithuthi, ezemfundo, iinkonzo kwanendawo yokuhlala kwanolawulo olululo lweentlekele. Iimali ze-CMIP zinikezelwa kumanqanaba amaphulo asixhenxe (amanzi, ucoceko, imigaqo, inkukuma eluqilima, amaziko asekuhlaleni, izibane kwiindawo ekuhlaleni kwanamanzi eenkqwithelo).

I-CMIP eNtshona Koloni kwisithuba esisukela ngonyaka ka-1997 ukuya ku-2004 ichithe amakhulu amathandathu anamashumi asibhozo nethoba lezigidi nekhulu lamawaka eerandi kumaphulo ezibonelelo zoomaspala aliwaka elinamashumi amathandathu nesithathu, wona adale amawaka amabini anamakhulu amane neshumi elinanye lezigidi zamathuba engqesho.

Ngexesha leli khulu leentsuku zokuqala, amaphulo eCMIP anikezelwa kwaba maspala balandelayo:
* iWitzenberg
* iBhobhofolo
* iTheewaterskloof
* iCape Agulhas
* iSaldanha Bay



AMAPHULO OKWAKHIWA KWEZINDLU


Amaphulo okwakhiwa kwezindlu angavalwa, ngamanye amaxesha ngenxa yokuphixana kwezidingo nezinyanzeliso ekuhlaleni. Ngexesha leli khulu lokuqala leentsuku, amanyathelo aqhubela phambili, afana nokubanjwa kweembizo zasekuhlaleni ukuzama ukusombulula iimpixano, athatyathwa ukuvala la maphulo okwakhiwa kwezindlu alandelayo:
* Imizamo Yethu
* iAvian Park
* iMbekweni
* iPaarl
* iLwandle



AMAQELA EENTLEKELE


Iskhokelo senziwa ukunqanda nokudambisa imililo ze kuncitshiswe nezikhukula kwiindawo ezisematyotyombeni ukuqinisekisa ulawulo olululo lweentlekele kwezi ngingqi. Iingingqi ekufuneka zizuzile kwiimpendulo zeentlekele ezingxamisekileyo ziquka iBrown's Farm, iGugulethu, iCrossroads, iKosovo, iWallacedene neDoringwacht.


ULAWULO LUKARHULUMENTE OLUHLANGANYELWEYO


Indibano engolawulo lukarhulumente olungumvuka wentsebenziswano yabo bonke ooceba boorhulumente bamakhaya yayibanjwe ngomhla wamashumi amabini ananye kwinyanga yeSilimela. Oku kufuneka kukhokelele kwintsebenziswano enkulu kunoku phakathi kukarhulumente wephondo noorhulumente bamakhaya.
